text: Angèle Mukakayange was a Rwandan politician. She was the first woman to be elected as a member of parliament in Rwanda. Angèle Mukakayange was elected as a MDR-Parmehutu Deputy for Butare in the 1965 Rwandan general election. She lost her seat in the 1969 election. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Possibly living people Category:Members of the Parliament of Rwanda Category:Rwandan women in politics
title: Angèle Mukakayange
